page.title: 14DEEPING ST.JAMES DOG KENNELS
page.content: The owner of Joseter kennels enters his dogs at all of the major dog shows including Crufts and the Peterborough Show. He travels all over the country to these competitions.The prizes at these shows are challenge certificates. If a dog wins three of these (under different judges) it can be called a champion. The cost of a Corgy puppy is about Â£80. A Boston Terrier costs about Â£200 while a Bichon Frise is Â£100 to Â£150. The kennels has a boarding licence for 68 dogs,and they own up to 30 dogs which they are breeding. Before a dog can be boarded the owner has to produ- uce an up to date inoculation certifi- cate.This shows that the dog has had injections against hard pad distemper and parvo virus. The dogs are fed on a complete dog food and also on undressed tripe.
